titles.title: A bill to amend the Oil Region National Heritage Area Act to reauthorize the Oil Region National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.
Oil Region National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act
Oil Region National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act
Oil Region National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.

bill.summary:
Oil Region National Heritage Area Reauthorization Act
This bill reauthorizes through the end of FY2026 the Oil Region National Heritage Area Act.
